arguments.name: daily check to book tee times
arguments.description: Check for available tee times daily at 5:30 AM EST

payload.user_prompt: Can you please book me golf tee times for golf for both Saturday and Sunday for the next two weeks (up to 4 teetimes) at Birdsfoot Golf Course starting at 10 AM? Do not schedule if I already have a tee time on that day.
